languages.text: {n}Минута молчания, наполненная только стонами огромной машины, и вдруг кибергоргулья начинает говорить, а с ней хором — и прочие сервиторы, облюбованные Номос.{/n} "Мы проанализировали данные, которыми ты насытил{mf||а} нас, и восстановили последовательность событий".

{n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."
languages.original_text: {n}Минута молчания, наполненная только стонами огромной машины, и вдруг кибергоргулья начинает говорить, а с ней хором — и прочие сервиторы, облюбованные Номос.{/n} "Мы проанализировали данные, которыми ты насытил{mf||а} нас, и восстановили последовательность событий".

traits.locale_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

traits.locale_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Por un momento, se produce un silencio que solo los gemidos de la enorme máquina interrumpe. Después, la cibergárgola empieza a hablar acompañada de los otros servidores elegidos por Nomos:{/n} «Hemos analizado los datos con los que nos ha saciado y recreado la secuencia de los acontecimientos».
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."

traits.locale_text: {n}Por un momento, se produce un silencio que solo los gemidos de la enorme máquina interrumpe. Después, la cibergárgola empieza a hablar acompañada de los otros servidores elegidos por Nomos:{/n} «Hemos analizado los datos con los que nos ha saciado y recreado la secuencia de los acontecimientos».
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}しばらくの間、巨大な機械のうめき声だけが聞こえる静寂が続いた後、サーバーガーゴイルとノモスに選ばれたサーヴィターが話し始めた。{/n}「あなたが我々に提供した大量のデータを分析し、一連の出来事を再現した」
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."

traits.locale_text: {n}しばらくの間、巨大な機械のうめき声だけが聞こえる静寂が続いた後、サーバーガーゴイルとノモスに選ばれたサーヴィターが話し始めた。{/n}「あなたが我々に提供した大量のデータを分析し、一連の出来事を再現した」
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}片刻沉默之后，巨大机器的低鸣声打破了寂静。随后，那只电子滴水嘴兽开了口，由诺莫斯挑选出来的其他机仆也跟着开了口。{/n}“我们分析了你传给我们的数据，我们重现了事件的顺序。”
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."

traits.locale_text: {n}片刻沉默之后，巨大机器的低鸣声打破了寂静。随后，那只电子滴水嘴兽开了口，由诺莫斯挑选出来的其他奴工也跟着开了口。{/n}“我们分析了你传给我们的数据，我们重现了事件的顺序。”
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Le silence s'installe, uniquement troublé par les gémissements de l'énorme machine, puis la cybergargouille se met à parler, accompagnée par les autres servitors choisis par Nomos.{/n} « En analysant les données dont vous nous avez nourris, nous avons reconstitué l'enchaînement des événements. »
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le silence s'installe, uniquement troublé par les gémissements de l'énorme machine, puis la cybergargouille se met à parler, accompagnée par les autres servitors choisis par Nomos.{/n} « En analysant les données dont vous nous avez nourris, nous avons reconstitué l'enchaînement des événements. »
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Einen Augenblick lang herrscht Schweigen, unterbrochen nur von dem Ächzen der riesigen Maschine. Dann beginnt der Cybergargoyle zu sprechen, und damit auch die anderen von Nomos ausgewählten Servitoren:{/n} "Wir haben die Daten analysiert, mit denen Ihr uns gesättigt habt, und haben die Ereignisse nachgestellt."
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."

traits.locale_text: {n}Einen Augenblick lang herrscht Schweigen, unterbrochen nur von dem Ächzen der riesigen Maschine. Dann beginnt der Cybergargoyle zu sprechen, und damit auch die anderen von Nomos ausgewählten Servitoren:{/n} "Wir haben die Daten analysiert, mit denen Ihr uns gesättigt habt, und haben die Ereignisse nachgestellt."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos

languages.text: {n}Ortama bir müddet sessizlik hâkim oluyor. Ara ara dev makinenin iniltileriyle bölünen bu sessizlik, sibergargoylun konuşmaya başlamasıyla ve Nomos'un seçtiği diğer hizmetörlerin ona eşlik etmesiyle son buluyor.{/n} "Bize sağladığınız veriyi inceledik ve olay örgüsünü tekrar oluşturduk."
languages.original_text: {n}For a moment there is silence, broken only by the moans of the huge machine, and then the cybergargoyle begins to speak, and with it, the other servitors chosen by Nomos:{/n} "We have analysed the data with which you sated us, and we have recreated the sequence of events."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ortama bir müddet sessizlik hâkim oluyor. Ara ara dev makinenin iniltileriyle bölünen bu sessizlik, sibergargoylun konuşmaya başlamasıyla ve Nomos'un seçtiği diğer hizmetörlerin ona eşlik etmesiyle son buluyor.{/n} "Bize sağladığınız veriyi inceledik ve olay örgüsünü tekrar oluşturduk."
traits.speaker: PeacefulServitor_Nomos
